mutants.original_line: pc = 1  # Initially, only one computer has the PDF
mutants.code:
from math import ceil

def calculate_minimum_time(N, M):
    pc = 2
    pd = 0
    time = 0
    while pc < N:
        (pc, pd) = (pc + pd, pd + pc)
        time += 1
        if pd >= M and pc <= N:
            time += int(ceil((N - pc) / float(M)))
            break
    return time

def calculate_minimum_time(N, M):
    pc = 1
    pd = 0
    time = 0
    while pc < N:
        (pc, pd) = (pc + pd, pd + pc)
        time += 1
        if pd >= M and pc <= N:
            time += int(ceil(N * pc / float(M)))
            break
    return time
